Html:
I'm hoping someone could assist me in understanding how to invoke the progress bar. I'm currently using some sqlite operations on a background worker thread and would like to see an indeterminate progress bar as the user waits.

Cheers,
Ethan

Add a ProgressBar to your page and bind the Visibility to an IsBusy property on your view model.

The indeterminate state of the default WPF progressbar is properly styled for use in mui apps (see also the demo app, controls > styles > progressbar)
